price: Uko ni na ko duhana uwarengereye ntiyemere ibimenyetso bya Nyagasani we. Kandi rwose ibihano byo ku munsi w’imperuka ni byo bikaze ndetse bizahoraho.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَنۡ أَسۡرَفَ وَلَمۡ يُؤۡمِنۢ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِۦۚ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَشَدُّ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika najzī man asrafa walam yu'min biāyāti rabbihi walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati ashaddu wa-abqā
